name: Ambermoon Arcade
overview: There you are, on a dusty road in the middle of the Hoimon desert and your enemies are right at your heels. It has been two days since you escaped from the captivity of the orcs and their allies. Your destination is the city of Spannenberg. You will be safe there and catch your breath. It sis still a long way to Newlake, but soon you will be reunited with your friends. ...and then the orc's barbaric slavery will be put to an end.
